channel.title: Increase the size of Creative world?
channel.description: so, i dont think 600 border limit is big enough for creative, since its going to get flooded with art and stuff soon, so can you Moparisthebest Increase the size by maybe about 400 for now? or 200...

item.title: Increase the size of Creative world?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

No more pony discussion. I’ve just removed a lot of posts, if you want an in depth discussion about ponies and who watches them then go and make another thread.

It’s fine bringing it in a little, but completely changing the direction of the thread into something that isn’t even in the slightest related isn’t.

Read full topic
item.source: Increase the size of Creative world?

item.title: Increase the size of Creative world?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“hat trix, post:16, topic:434484”][quote author=mironic link=topic=537205.msg3928290#msg3928290 date=1330442200]

We (a selection of people vs your selection of people) do not want to see your “art” if it’s a meme.
[/quote]ponys are not a meme sir. they are a show.

a show for 5 year old, little girls.[/quote]
My older cousin used to love My Little Pony, but that was over 20 years ago (I was 6 20 years ago…), don’t know how they are popular now.

Read full topic

item.title: Increase the size of Creative world?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“mironic, post:12, topic:434484”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=537205.msg3927865#msg3927865 date=1330392293]
Bring back weather. Only 2 or 3 people dislike the weather, and that’s not a majority.
[/quote] if you want more snow, make snowmen… peoples art gets cover’d up by snow… and this is a creative world…[/quote]
You made fucking ponies -.-
And I like how the snow looks. It’s a nice touch, who are you to decide how the weather works? You are no god.

Read full topic
